main event: A bright light resembling a star was observed in Malden, Massachusetts, on July 7, 1962.
interesting points: The object changed brightness, size, and position during the observation,It appeared solid and maintained a northward course,The observation lasted for 20 minutes,One witness reported seeing an oval shape like a half silver dollar on August 6, 1962,There were no discernible sounds or trails emitted by the object.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
